casebody.data:
SAULS
v.
SAULS 395P14-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 W. Gregory Duke, Attorney at Law, Greenville, for Sauls, Roland Gary. Jonathan G. McGirt, Attorney at Law, for Sauls, Lois A.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of August 2015 by Defendant for Issuance of Stay:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
